item.title: Typing Unicode Characters in Ubuntu
item.description: Ever since I decided that ` was he best means to toggle Yakuake (which has been my lifeline for an integral part of the way I work for a long time now), typing ` whenever I needed it has been hell. After going through a great deal and self doubt, the final outcome deserves being documented.
